content: page 1 of 2 daylily coaster by arina shofiya daylily coaster is a cute coaster with a picot edging and delicate lace pattern in the center the pattern is worked in the round starting at the edge and worked towards the center it can be worked in any weight yarn with the corresponding needle size however the yarn usage and the finished measurements will be different from the sample please read through the instructions before starting the project for pattern-related issues or questions please contact me at aderizky ub@gmail com this pattern is intended for personal use only any copying distribution or publication is not allowed ©arina2022 page 2 of 2 finished measurements picot edging diameter 5 5 / 14 cm with scrap yarn cast on 110 sts using crochet provisional cast on method using the edge color knit one row place beginning of round marker and join in the materials round being careful not to twist  approximately 55 yds /50 m of fingering weight yarn round 1-4 k all shown in the sample edge color 22 yds /20 m round 5 *yo k2tog* repeat around main color 33 yds /30 m round 6-10 k all  us 2 / 2 75 mm dpns or circular needle for magic loop remove the scrap yarn and place the live sts on a separate set of needles knit the  3 0 mm crochet hook for provisional cast on sts from each set of needles together using the three needle join method please  notions see reference videos for more information 5 stitch markers & tapestry needle continue to next section gauge lace section 32 stitches x 40 row in 4 x 4 / 10 cm x 10 cm stockinette stitch using the main color work this section according to the chart or using the following written instructions below if needed place stitch markers between each reference videos repeat provisional cast on using a crochet hook https //youtu be/0wkqrg4tmv4 picot edging https //youtu be/gcahtakzltk round 1 k11 yo k11 x5 - 115 sts three needle join https //youtu be/cbhvf5ve3u0 round 2 and all even rounds k all sts k3tog https //youtu be/zviu8wtc2qq round 3 k8 k3tog yo k1 yo sssk k8 x5 - 105 sts sssk https //youtu be/7xkqkqnjvau round 5 k6 k3tog yo k3 yo sssk k6 x5 - 95 sts cdd https //youtu be/jjun_htwbce round 7 k4 k3tog yo k1 yo cdd yo k1 yo sssk k4 x5 - 85 sts round 9 k3 k2tog yo k2 cdd k2 yo ssk k3 x5 - 75 sts abbreviations round 11 k1 k3tog yo k1 yo k1 cdd k1 yo k1 yo sssk k1 x5 - 65 sts cdd center double decrease round 13 k2tog yo k3 yo cdd yo k3 yo ssk x5 - 65 sts k knit round 15 ssk yo k3 cdd k3 yo k2tog x5 - 55 sts k2tog knit two stitches together round 17 ssk yo k2 cdd k2 yo k2tog x5 - 45 sts k3tog
